segments.text: Charlotte , have you had your supper ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don ’ t want to eat anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My manager jumped on me for my mistake today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must not feel depressed about such a trivial thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'm too clumsy . I can do nothing well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'd better shape up if you want to get the job done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cheer up ! Don't let me down . We all make mistakes , and that is life .
segments.speaker: S1
